Apartment Rental Agreement

This agreement is entered into on December 30, 2024 between the Landlord and the Tenant for the rental of the property located at 123 Main Street, Apartment 4B.

Term: This lease shall begin on January 1, 2025 and continue for a period of one year, ending on December 31, 2025.

Rent: The monthly rent is one thousand five hundred dollars, due on the first day of each month. A late fee of fifty dollars will be charged for payments received after the fifth day of the month.

Security Deposit: A security deposit of one thousand five hundred dollars has been paid and will be held by the Landlord. This deposit will be returned within thirty days after the lease termination, minus any deductions for damages or unpaid rent.

Utilities: The Tenant is responsible for electricity, gas, and internet services. Water and trash collection are included in the rent.

Maintenance: The Tenant agrees to maintain the premises in good condition and report any necessary repairs promptly.

Both parties have read and agree to the terms stated above.
